title: Estimate derivative value of a function from table

content.question: The table above gives selected values of a function f. The function is twice differentiable with <math> <mrow> <msup> <mi>f</mi> <mo>″</mo> </msup> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>></mo> <mn>0</mn> </mrow> </math>. Which of the following could be the value of <math> <mrow> <msup> <mi>f</mi> <mo>′</mo> </msup> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mn>3</mn> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> </math> ?

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Provide reasons or rationales for solutions and conclusions.
